item.display_name: Maybelline New York Baby Lips Lip Balm (Cherry Kiss)
item.product_name_without_brand: New York Baby Lips Lip Balm (Cherry Kiss)

line_items.title: Included in the Box
line_items.description: 1 x Maybelline New York Baby Lips Lip Balm

line_items.title: How to Use
line_items.description:
Effortlessly hydrate your lips with our nourishing lip balm, perfect as a base for any lip colour.

  • Hydrate the top lip from the middle to the corners.
  • Glide on the bottom lip for full coverage.
  • Perfect for lipstick priming and hydration.

line_items.title: Description
line_items.description:
Get baby-like lips in just 4 weeks with Maybelline Cherry Kiss Lip Balm. Its hydrating formula, with SPF 20, will give you the touch of fruity flavor you desire. Try it now!

  • Returns And Refund Policy: This item is eligible for a refund/replacement within 4 days of purchase in the unlikely event of receiving a damaged, defective, or incorrect item. Please ensure the item is in its original condition, with the brand's outer packaging, user manual, price tags, and all original accessories in the manufacturer's packaging for a successful pickup. For incorrect items, a replacement request can only be raised if the item is sealed, unopened, and unused.
